contents.item: Keep your maximum focus on the present and a little planning ahead because without the present there is no future
It's OK to glance in the rear-view to see where you've been, but stay focused on where you are going!
Everybody listens to me with a focus on my words. This is a mistake. The words are the vehicle to deliver an idea. Always listen to the idea, it's more valid then any words that I can use.
Don’t compromise your focus by comparing what you are trying to learn to what you already know. Focus in the moment, on what you are trying to learn now.
contents.owner: Lorii Myers, No Excuses, The Fit Mind-Fit Body Strategy Book

contents.item: When we constantly meditate on another's faults, it is because we are neglecting our own unhealed wounds.
contents.owner: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

contents.item: Success comes from finding your center and self.
contents.owner: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

contents.item: Two people that have the same wants are two people that should be friends.
People who score zero are not only those who do not participate in the game, but also those who play very well but have no goal in focus!
Hatred can't erase love memories.You need to focus on anything else.
We don't treat Jesus like a puppy, soaking in his excitement over our coming home and then leading him back to stay in the laundry room when we go out to begin another day.
contents.owner: Holly Sprink, Faith Postures: Cultivating Christian Mindfulness

contents.item: To be rich, focus on your wealth.
Take 5" is the practice if spending 5 minutes a day giving focused attention to your hopes for your talent.
contents.owner: Don Maruska, Take Charge of Your Talent: Three Keys to Thriving in Your Career, Organization, and Life

contents.item: Stop obsessing about where you invest your money.Focus instead, on where you invest your time.
contents.owner: Gyan Nagpal, Talent Economics: The Fine Line Between Winning and Losing the Global War for Talent
